packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Excel
packages.releaseNotes:
• Make the active cell more visible with Focus Cell. Focus cells applies vibrant highlights to the corresponding row and column of the active cell and increases the cell's border thickness.

• We're introducing two new functions designed to simplify and automate translations directly within your spreadsheet, TRANSLATE & DECTECTLANGUAGE.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes:
Feature Updates:
• Shared Mailboxes: We now support Shared Mailboxes in Outlook for Mac for Exchange On-Premise environment.
• Calendar: Access Teams meeting chat from meeting reminders: We support easy access to Teams meeting chat from the reminder window.
• Calendar: Quickly glance which meeting is up next by looking at My Day in the menu bar.
• Admin Pref: Added a preference for admins to set Focused Inbox off by default. Users can manually turn on Focused Inbox. Details can be accessed here.
• M365 Copilot Chat: Your AI assistant for work, grounding Copilot conversations in both the latest large language models (LLM) and information from your content and the web, directly in Outlook.

Resolved Issues:
• Accessibility: Fixed an issue where Infobar text is unreadable when hovering over a button in dark mode.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where disabling Encrypt Only and Do Not Forward also hid related templates in Outlook for Mac. The preferences will now only disable Encrypt Only and Do Not Forward from the UI, allowing labels to remain visible as intended.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where delegates were not seeing the correct infobar when meetings are tentatively accepted on behalf of a manager.
• Mail: Fixed an issue where SMIME encrypted emails moved to "On My Computer" were not displaying any content in Outlook for Mac.
• Crash: Fixed the issue that caused Outlook to crash when the admin pushed the SMIMECertificatesLookupOrder property to client machines.
• Crash: Fixed an issue where double-clicking the group calendar in side-by-side mode caused Outlook to crash.
• Performance: Fixed a performance issue that occurred when using multiple profiles in Outlook.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the smiley face in the top-right of the app.
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
packages.releaseNotes:
This is a quick release to address minor UI issues related to device cards and the Cloud PC details sheet.

If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
packages.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

packages.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
packages.releaseNotes:
Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. 
Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. 
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
